channel.title: CVE Feed for Elastic -- Elastic X-Pack Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elastic -- Elastic X-Pack Security

item.title: CVE-2016-10364|2024-08-06T03:21:50.862Z -- elastic -- elastic%20x-pack%20security
item.description: With X-Pack installed, Kibana versions 5.0.0 and 5.0.1 were not properly authenticating requests to advanced settings and the short URL service, any authenticated user could make requests to those services regardless of their own permissions.
